it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.model.items.powerup

Class PowerupCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.model.items.powerup.PowerupCreator

  • public class PowerupCreator
extends Object
    Static resource class which loads powerups from JSON file and makes them available for retrieval. After the initial loading from file, any class can request to build a stack (a.k.a. deck) of powerups.
    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Collection<PowerupCard> createPowerupDeck()
      Returns a collection with all the powerup cards in the deck.
      static void loadPowerupPack(String filePath)
      Loads and validates all powerups specified in a powerup pack file.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • loadPowerupPack

        public static void loadPowerupPack(String filePath)
        Loads and validates all powerups specified in a powerup pack file. Note that if another pack was previously loaded, the loaded content is overwritten
        Parameters:
        filePath - resource path of the Powerup Pack JSON file
        Throws:
        MissingResourceException - if the required file is not found
        org.json.JSONException - if anything goes wrong while parsing JSON
        org.everit.json.schema.ValidationException - if the JSON is invalid

      • createPowerupDeck

        public static Collection<PowerupCard> createPowerupDeck()
        Returns a collection with all the powerup cards in the deck. The objects in the list are all distinct and immutable, i.e. the're suitable to be inserted in the powerup stack.
        Returns:
        a collection with all the powerups in the deck
